chalk.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: soft white or grey rock formed a long time ago from the shells of small sea animals
chalk.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: small sticks of a white or coloured substance like soft rock, used for writing or drawing
chalk.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: writing in chalk on the blackboard
chalk.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to write, mark, or draw something with chalk
